clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin connected to CLK.

*See also: [tlc5971 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin connected to DIN.

*See also: [tlc5971 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `tlc5971` component. Use this if you have multiple TLC5971 chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [tlc5971 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#configuration-variables)*

num_chips.docs:
**, int**: Number of chips in the chain. Must be in range from 1 to 85. Defaults to 1.

*See also: [tlc5971 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the TLC5971 chain of this output component.

*See also: [tlc5971 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [tlc5971 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#id1)*

tlc5971_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#tlc5971-component). Use this if you have multiple TLC5971 chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [tlc5971 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/tlc5971.html#id1)*
